alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 1:50PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible with locally higher amounts. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of snow are notoriously difficult to forecast. Any minor shift north or south will result in drastic changes to snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
